changes.name: Lok-tar ogar!

texts.text: Changed functionality: If Into the Fray's target throw target is a non-heroic unit it stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: I want to make throwing non-heroic units something viable rather than a mistake

changes.name: New: Bull rush

texts.text: Garrosh runs in a straigh line, knockbacking enemies that enters on contact with him.
subtexts: Range will be 7.0 | Valla Vault has 5.0 range | Dwarf Toss has 8.0 range
Missile Speed will be 15 | Valla Vault is 14 | Dwarf toss is 30
Cast needs to be finished before being to cast skills

changes.developerCommentary: Even tho this gives Garrosh great mobility it's on cost of not getting cleanse also it's on par with the character angry style.

changes.name: New: Groundbreaking tactics

texts.text: GroundBreaker can now be channeled for up to 2 seconds, increasing the outer area radius up to 40%. If channeled to Maximum enemies will be pulled towards Garrosh instead of stunned

changes.developerCommentary: Inspired on Sion Decimating Smash and justify the old garrosh interaction being gatekeeped by maximum channeling and by not picking cleanse
